channel.title: CVE Feed for Synology -- Synology Drive Client
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Synology -- Synology Drive Client

item.title: CVE-2023-52946|2024-09-26T03:31:38.479Z -- synology -- synology%20drive%20client
item.description: Buffer copy without checking size of input ('Classic Buffer Overflow') vulnerability in vss service component in Synology Drive Client before 3.5.0-16084 allows remote attackers to overwrite trivial buffers and crash the client via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2022-49037|2024-09-26T03:32:31.301Z -- synology -- synology%20drive%20client
item.description: Insertion of sensitive information into log file vulnerability in proxy settings component in Synology Drive Client before 3.3.0-15082 allows remote authenticated users to obtain sensitive information via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2022-49038|2024-09-26T03:33:01.093Z -- synology -- synology%20drive%20client
item.description: Inclusion of functionality from untrusted control sphere vulnerability in OpenSSL DLL component in Synology Drive Client before 3.3.0-15082 allows local users to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2022-49040|2024-09-26T03:34:10.329Z -- synology -- synology%20drive%20client
item.description: Buffer copy without checking size of input ('Classic Buffer Overflow') vulnerability in connection management functionality in Synology Drive Client before 3.4.0-15721 allows local users with administrator privileges to crash the client via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2022-49041|2024-09-26T03:34:56.493Z -- synology -- synology%20drive%20client
item.description: Buffer copy without checking size of input ('Classic Buffer Overflow') vulnerability in backup task management functionality in Synology Drive Client before 3.4.0-15721 allows local users with administrator privileges to crash the client via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2022-49039|2024-09-26T03:33:29.551Z -- synology -- synology%20drive%20client
item.description: Out-of-bounds write vulnerability in backup task management functionality in Synology Drive Client before 3.4.0-15721 allows local users with administrator privileges to execute arbitrary commands via unspecified vectors.
